reason_for_emotion: Claimant reported back pain following incident and is dealing with aftermath of accident
claim_summary: Claimant Bugs Bunny was involved in a car accident where another driver collided into his vehicle from behind while he was stopped at a red light. Followed up with pictures of the damage and reported persistent back pain following incident. Medical reports confirmed a soft tissue injury.
reason_for_further_assessment: Police report is absent. Also, further medical examinations may be necessary due to reported back pain.
